about_the_game:
【Pack Description]

This DLC contains 24 tracks featuring retro-style music.
As indicated by "vol.1" in the title, we intend to expand it into a series, and plan to maintain consistency across the series by incorporating unified motifs!
Also, terms like "ME" and "Event" in track names are provided for reference only; feel free to utilize them as needed!
Tracks intended for loop playback are identified by "loop" at the end of their names.

Pack Content:


-ogg
-m4a


Total 24 tracks
1. me - Item get
2. me - Riddle
3. other - Because you were there
4. other - Shop_loop
5. other - Ceremony_loop
6. other - Disturbance and Faint Hope
7. other - Fairy theme_loop
8. other - House_loop
9. other - Heroic Poem_loop
10. event - Memories of Two People_loop
11. event - Those were the days_loop
12. event - The Unknown
13. event - ! Loop
14. town - Fairies' home_loop
15. town - Town 1_loop
16. town - Town2_loop
17. dungeon - Dungeon_loop
18. dungeon - Tower in the Sky_loop
19. dungeon - Cave_loop
20. battle - Boss battle_loop
21. battle - Battle1_loop
22. battle - Battle 2_loop
23. field - Volcanic Zone_loop
24. field - Forest where it started snowing_loop

----

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
detailed_description:
【Pack Description]

This DLC contains 24 tracks featuring retro-style music.
As indicated by "vol.1" in the title, we intend to expand it into a series, and plan to maintain consistency across the series by incorporating unified motifs!
Also, terms like "ME" and "Event" in track names are provided for reference only; feel free to utilize them as needed!
Tracks intended for loop playback are identified by "loop" at the end of their names.
